revision.text: The '''Sprinklotad''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berries]] replanting themselves if left to wither in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Hoenn]] Berry Master in Mauville City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
